question: Which cricketer has become the world's top-ranked Test all-rounder by displacing Jason Holder?
explanation:
Englandâ€™s star cricketer Ben Stokes has displaced West Indies captain Jason Holder to become the world's top-ranked Test all-rounder.
Ben Stokes also attained his career-best third position among batsmen in the ICC Test Player Rankings. Recently, he delivered an outstanding performance in the Test match with the West Indies at Old Trafford.
